radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive chronic changes of Takayasu arteritis, including occlusion of arch vessels and diminutive lower-extremity runoff vessels. Severe short-segment proximal occlusions of the left subclavian artery and mild occlusion of the right subclavian artery.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Revascularization with stent placement resulted in resolution of pain and improvement in skin lesions.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild narrowing of the left subclavian artery.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No further intervention was pursued because the pain and lesions improved spontaneously.
